abstract: The purchase of the Old Lane hedge fund cost Citigroup $800 million and netted Vikram Pandit $165 million. At the time, the purchase was more about buying Mr. Pandit, a former Morgan Stanley star, than it was about adding the roughly $4.5 billion in assets his firm held to Citi's fold.

headline.main: A Trip Down the Short, Sad Path of Old Lane
